71,166,120,164,117,185,73,187,####ANP
69,191,118,191,118,206,70,204,#######
47,215,138,213,137,228,47,230,####ACADEMY
83,230,102,230,102,237,85,236,####OF
48,238,90,238,90,248,48,249,####NATURE
101,238,136,237,135,248,102,246,####PEACE
184,143,213,143,213,156,184,156,####ART
213,143,231,143,232,160,213,157,####OF
231,141,273,142,274,156,232,156,####LIVING
275,143,290,143,290,155,278,155,####IN
291,142,339,141,340,155,295,156,####NATURE
341,142,367,142,367,155,341,156,####AND
369,141,407,140,409,156,371,156,####PEACE
178,165,205,166,206,179,178,179,####"Đến
207,167,227,165,229,180,209,177,####Với
227,165,253,165,253,177,230,177,####Thế
254,165,277,166,277,179,255,179,####Giới
278,166,300,165,301,179,280,179,####Này
302,165,317,165,317,177,303,177,####Là
319,164,336,164,335,176,319,178,####Để
337,166,359,164,359,179,340,178,####Học
361,166,383,165,383,177,363,179,####Cho
386,165,418,166,418,178,387,177,####Được
208,180,249,180,248,198,209,195,####Những
249,180,269,180,269,192,248,194,####Bài
270,180,294,181,293,197,269,197,####Học
296,179,317,179,319,193,295,193,####Của
319,181,353,180,354,193,322,193,####Chính
355,180,390,180,389,193,354,193,####Mình"
275,197,299,196,300,207,274,206,####Pháp
300,194,325,195,324,208,300,207,####Minh
195,226,226,228,226,244,199,242,####"Hãy
227,228,258,228,258,241,228,240,####Sống
260,227,289,227,289,242,260,241,####Cuộc
290,227,313,227,314,238,290,238,####Đời
315,227,349,228,351,242,314,240,####Thuận
350,226,367,226,368,242,352,241,####Tự
368,225,405,226,404,240,369,241,####Nhiên
238,242,257,242,259,260,242,258,####Và

325,242,362,242,362,256,325,256,####Nhé !"
